EmailTemplate.description: Sent to customers to advise resolution
EmailTemplate.name: Resolved Non-FCR email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: SunPower Alert:(Indicate Request) Request Completed - Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Just letting you know that we have completed your request to <Indicate Request>. Please feel free to reply to this email if you still need help or require more information, otherwise we will close the case ({!Case.CaseNumber}).
You may also contact us via https://us.sunpower.com and click on the “How can we help?” button at the bottom of your browser to launch a chat window. Alternatively you can call us at 1-800-786-7693. We’re here for you Monday through Friday from 4 a.m. until 7 p.m.
We are also inviting you take a short survey about our customer service and your SunPower experience. Your feedback helps us understand what you value about our service and where we can serve you better. You will receive another email with a link to the survey upon case closure.
Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFullName} | Customer Service Representative Global Business and Finance Services | office 1-800-786-7693 (SUNPOWER) |
